Hello!

I’m Leon, a dad, husband, and writer/designer. I work at Balsamiq, maker of the best little wireframing tool around. I help people and technology get along better.

Perhaps you’d like to find out what I do for work, like write and speak about User Experience design and documentation, among other things.

Or maybe you’d like to learn about my fun side projects, like making random websites and my recent DJ hobby.

If else, you might just want to contact me.
